fields.title: Welcome
fields.content: Please email us at fellows-management@software.ac.uk to have your account confirmed.

fields.title: Guidelines on reimbursement of expenses
fields.content:
Expenses supported by the Software Sustainability Institute, including those incurred by Fellows, are subject to the Expenses Policy of the University of Edinburgh. This is a summary of the main points indicated in the Policy. For reference, we are attaching this Policy at the end of this summary. When in doubt please see the write to fellows-management@software.ac.uk​.

  • Make sure you obtain original, itemised receipts / VAT receipts for all items you are claiming reimbursement. Credit/Debit card receipts are not sufficient.
    • In certain situations it is not feasible to obtain receipts for small items. In these cases, unvouched items under £5 will be accepted for reimbursement. Please put the actual cost of the item on the form, not “£5”.
  • Use the form provided for claiming expenses incurred on behalf of the Software Sustainability Institute.
    • On the claim form, state your Home Address (not your Work Address).
    • Make sure you have filled out your bank details correctly and clearly.
    • List each item so it matches a receipt (do not sum receipts into e.g. “Meals”).
  • Once your claim is fully completed, please add every relevant receipts and:
    • Scan it (form+receipts) and send the digital copy it to fellows-management@software.ac.uk​ ;
    • Send the paper originals (form+receipts) to 
      Giacomo Peru
EPCC
University of Edinburgh
James Clerk Maxwell Building
Peter Guthrie Tait Road
Edinburgh
EH9 3FD
  • It is important that the scan you send by email be identical to the paper originals you send by post. Payments will not be released until we receive the paper originals, but the scanned copy will speed our processes up.
  • We cannot reimburse expenses for events which have not yet taken place. Please email us if this is an issue for larger value items such as flights and accommodation as we may be able to book these for you.
  • Only reasonable expenses actually incurred in pursuit of University business, and properly supported by receipts, will be reimbursed. Certain items of expenditure are subject to specified limits and conditions, as set out in the University’s policy on reimbursements of expenses. This includes:
    • Travel should normally be by the cheapest means of transport. Normally this will mean standard class rail travel, economy class air travel and public transport.
    • Expenditure on lunch or dinner should not normally exceed £40.
    • Alcohol will not be reimbursed.

fields.title: We have a new funding request pending your review
fields.content:
Hi,

We received a new funding request for

{{fund.name}}.

Please visit {{ protocol }}://{{ site.domain }}{{fund.link_review}} to review it.

---
LowFAT

fields.title: We have a new blog post draft pending your review
fields.content:
Hi,

We received a blog post draft for

{{blog.fund.name}}.

Please visit {{ protocol }}://{{ site.domain }}{{blog.link_review}} to review it.

---
LowFAT

fields.title: We received your blog post draft
fields.content:
Dear {{blog.fund.claimant.fullname}},

Thank you for your blog post draft about {{blog.fund.name}}.

We will review it and get in touch with you before publication on our website.

You can check the status of your blog post draft at {{ protocol }}://{{ site.domain }}{{blog.link}}.

Best wishes,
Fellows Management ({{FELLOWS_MANAGEMENT_EMAIL}})
Software Sustainability Institute

fields.title: We received your funding request
fields.content:
Dear {{fund.claimant.fullname}},

We have received your funding request for {{fund.name}}.

The Fellows Management team will evaluate it and reply to you in the next few days.

You can check the status of your funding request at {{ protocol }}://{{ site.domain }}{{fund.link}}.

If you do not hear from us in 3 days then please email us a reminder to {{FELLOWS_MANAGEMENT_EMAIL}}.

Best wishes,
Fellows Management ({{FELLOWS_MANAGEMENT_EMAIL}})
Software Sustainability Institute

fields.title: We have a new expense claim pending your review
fields.content:
Hi,

We received a new expense claim for

{{expense.fund.name}}.

Please visit {{ protocol }}://{{ site.domain }}{{expense.link_review}} to review it.

---
LowFAT

fields.title: We received your expense claim
fields.content:
Dear {{expense.fund.claimant.fullname}},

We have received your expenses claim of £{{expense.amount_claimed}} for {{expense.fund.name}}.

We will process it as soon as possible and we will contact you if needed.

You can check the status of your expense claim at {{ protocol }}://{{ site.domain }}{{expense.link}}.

Best wishes,
Fellows Management ({{FELLOWS_MANAGEMENT_EMAIL}})
Software Sustainability Institute

fields.title: New message about your blog post draft
fields.content:
Dear {{new.fund.claimant.fullname}},

Your blog post draft for {{new.fund.name}} has been published at {{new.published_url}}.

And we mentioned it on Twitter, {{new.tweet_url}}.
{% if notes %}
Notes:
---
{{notes}}
---
{% endif %}
Best wishes,
Fellows Management ({{FELLOWS_MANAGEMENT_EMAIL}})
Software Sustainability Institute

fields.content:

You can check the details of your expense claim at {{ protocol }}://{{ site.domain }}{{new.link}}.
{% if notes %}
Notes:
---
{{notes}}
---
{% endif %}
Best wishes,
Fellows Management ({{FELLOWS_MANAGEMENT_EMAIL}})
Software Sustainability Institute
